pathTokens: Cape Ann Ice and Mixed Climbing

content.description: This is a decent enough, vertical wall a couple drips including a main one that forms well.  The wall is dank and scrappy enough that it won't really interest boulderers.  Underneath the moss, there are many decent edges for mixed bouldering. There also a thin seam that can be climbed with intricate tool work.  The landing is even pretty good. It is maybe 15' at its highest.
